snippet: The YES Network — fearing that a dispute will prevent Comcast customers from watching regular-season Yankee games — is trying to persuade fans to switch to providers like Verizon Fios and DirecTV.
abstract: YES Network launches effort to convince almost 1 million New York Yankees fans to switch cable providers after Comcast cuts channel from its systems in New Jersey and parts of Connecticut and Pennsylvania.
lead_paragraph: The YES Network — fearing that a dispute will prevent Comcast customers from watching regular-season Yankee games — is trying to persuade fans to switch to providers like Verizon Fios and DirecTV.

headline.main: Amid Impasse, YES Tells Comcast Customers to Switch Providers
headline.print_headline: Amid Impasse, YES Urges Customers to Leave Comcast
